channel.title: Autonomous Data Guard on MuShop
channel.description: Recent content in Autonomous Data Guard on MuShop

item.title: Setup
item.description: Introduction In this section we detail the steps required to perform a DR solution between ap-mumbai-1 and ap-hyderabad-1 regions. These regions are used as an example, you can choose the regions of your choice. Set Environment Variables export COMPARTMENT_ID=Your_compartment_id export DB_NAME=demoadb export DB_DISPLAY_NAME=demoadb export DB_PASSWORD=DemoAdb#1234 export WALLET_PW=DemoAdb#1234 export WALLET_ZIP=/tmp/Wallet_${DB_NAME}.zip Setup ADB (Autonomous Database) Create the Source ADB (Autonomous Database) oci db autonomous-database create --compartment-id ${COMPARTMENT_ID} --db-name ${DB_NAME} --admin-password ${DB_PASSWORD} --db-version 19c --cpu-core-count 1 --data-storage-size-in-tbs 1 --display-name ${DB_DISPLAY_NAME} Fetch the Source ADB (Autonomous Database) OCID
